articles.title: KPA Supreme Command: World Should Know Who Is Provoker
articles.content:
KPA Supreme Command: World Should Know Who Is Provoker
 Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- The Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army released the following communique Monday:
					 The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet military warmongers perpetrated such reckless military provocation as firing thousands of bullets and shells from the sensitive area of Yonphyong Island in the West Sea of Korea for an hour from 14:30 Monday despite strong warning of the KPA and condemnation of the public at home and abroad, far from drawing a lesson from the disgraceful defeat they suffered in the last Yonphyong Island shelling. 
					
					 Their military provocation was a product of their cunning scenario to deliberately lead the military counteraction of the DPRK to driving the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the brink of a war and thus save the U.S. Asia policy and strategy toward the DPRK from bankruptcy. 
					
					 It was, at the same time, to serve the propaganda purpose as it was aimed at saving the face of the present puppet authorities now finding themselves in such profound ruling crisis that it is hard for them to complete the tenure of their office because of their ignorance and incompetence and delivering the puppet military from its decline. 
					
					This was nothing but a childish play with fire of cowards without an equal as they made much fuss, firing shells left unused during the military provocation on November 23 after shifting by stealth the waters to be a scene of the projected shelling and its target for fear of the KPA's second and third retaliatory blows for self-defence. 
					
					 The revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK did not feel any need to retaliate against every despicable military provocation like one taking revenge after facing a blow.
					
					 The second and third powerful retaliatory strike to be made by the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK knowing no limit as declared before the world will lead to blowing up the bases of the U.S. and south Korean puppet warmongers. 
					
					 The world should properly know who is the true champion of peace and who is the real provocateur of a war.

articles.title: Gift from Governor of New Mexico State of US
articles.content:
Gift from Governor of New Mexico State of US
 Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by Bill Richardson, governor of New Mexico State of the U.S. on a visit to the DPRK.
					 The gift was conveyed to Kim Yong Dae, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, by the governor on Monday.

articles.title: New World Dictionary Published
articles.content:
New World Dictionary Published
 Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- The Science and Encyclopedia Publishing House of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea has brought out a new world dictionary.
					 It contains explanations and commonsense concerning the geneses of the world politics, military, economy, science, technology, literature and art, history and geography in Korean alphabetical order.
					
					 The book will contribute to widening intellectual horizon of the people.

articles.title: Many Houses Constructed
articles.content:
Many Houses Constructed
 Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- A large number of dwelling houses have been built in the DPRK this year.
					 Modern apartment blocks have appeared on the banks of the River Taedong, at the foot of Haebang Hill and other places in the capital city of Pyongyang.
					
					 Several thousand houses have been built in Ryongrim and Tongsin counties and Huichon City, Jagang Province.
					
					 In North Hwanghae Province many houses were constructed for peasants of the Migok Cooperative Farm in Sariwon City and the Sokjong and Samjong cooperative farms in Hwangju County and for hundreds of discharged soldiers who began working with the Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex.
					
					 Lots of new houses have also been constructed in North and South Phyongan, Kangwon, South Hamgyong and South Hwanghae provinces.

articles.title: All Koreans Called on to Hold Banner of Peace
articles.content:
All Koreans Called on to Hold Banner of Peace
 Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet warmongers going in league with outside forces are getting evermore frantic in their moves for a war of aggression against the DPRK, pushing the situation to the brink of a war, observes Rodong Sinmun Monday in a signed article.
					 The situation prevailing on the Korean Peninsula requires all the Koreans to wage a dynamic struggle for frustrating the moves of the U.S. imperialists and the puppet warmongers to provoke a new war, holding aloft the banner of peace against war, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 It is a vital task for defusing the ever-increasing danger of a war and protecting the nation's destiny to avert a war and defend peace.
					
					 After bringing an increasing number of its aggressor forces to south Korea the U.S. has escalated the moves for aggression against the DPRK. This is the root cause of escalating tension on the peninsula.
					
					 The successive ruling quarters of south Korea have run wild in their rackets to unleash a new war in league with the U.S. in an effort to do harm to compatriots by force of arms, backed by outside forces. The present ruling forces of south Korea, in particular, declared the confrontation between the systems, fanning up a tense atmosphere of confrontation with the DPRK. 
					
					 After sparking off the Yonphyong Island shelling incident, the puppet forces are kicking up hysteria of confrontation and war in league with outside forces, vociferating about "armed provocations" from someone.
					
					 It is the sinister intention of the puppet group to drive the inter-Korean relations to the worst phase and bring back the June 15 era of reunification to the era of confrontation through reckless firing of bullets and shells against its dialogue partner.
					
					 If the June 15 era of reunification is to advance and the cause of national reunification be accomplished, it is necessary to thoroughly foil the moves of the south Korean conservative group to ignite a war of aggression against the DPRK in league with outside forces, holding aloft the banner of peace against war.
					
					 Only when all the Koreans get united as one and wage a bold struggle for defending peace against war, can they surely check and frustrate the moves of outside forces and the puppet warmongers to provoke a new war.

articles.title: Year of Victory and Glory for DPRK
articles.content:
Year of Victory and Glory for DPRK
 Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- 2010 marks a year of jubilation as a bright prospect was opened for the DPRK advancing under the uplifted banner of Songun and an excited year which witnessed unprecedented innovations and leap forward on all fronts for building a thriving nation.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 No force on earth can bar the army and people of the DPRK from advancing under the Songun leadership of the great Workers' Party of Korea. The historical significance of the drive waged this year lies in that the Korean people clearly showed the whole world how their ideas are being translated into realities. 
					
					 The Conference of the WPK held in last September marked an important political event as it provided a milestone for effecting a decisive turn in steadily carrying forward the revolutionary cause of Juche and the cause of building a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation.
					
					The conference also marked a significant occasion as it demonstrated all the servicepersons and people's faith that only victory and glory are in store for them when they follow General Secretary Kim Jong Il and their unshakable determination and will to bring earlier a rosy future of Kim Il Sung's Korea under the leadership of the invincible WPK.
					
					 This year marked a year of miracles and changes as it has been crowded with events to be specially recorded in the history of the country for the distinguished political caliber and the outstanding and great leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 All the events and changes this year are the fruition of the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The shining successes made this year precisely mean the victory of the great harmonious whole of the leader and the people of the DPRK. Thanks to the might of the great single-minded unity the DPRK will in the future, too, effect world-startling changes one after another and bring earlier the historical day when a thriving nation will emerge.

articles.title: Anti-"Government" Actions Declared in S. Korea
articles.content:
Anti-"Government" Actions Declared in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Students Group for Actions against War and for Peace on the Korean Peninsula at a press conference in Seoul on Dec. 13 made public a declaration calling for actions for peace against war on the Korean Peninsula and for democracy. 
					 Referring to the danger of war increasing on the Korean Peninsula as the days go by, the declaration accused the Lee Myung Bak "government" of staging madcap war exercises, while letting loose bellicose remarks. 
					
					 It held that the situation on the Korean Peninsula is inching close to the brink of war because of the authorities' such policy of confrontation with the DPRK as staging various forms of exercises for a war of aggression against the DPRK and bringing the inter-Korean relations to collapse. 
					
					 It declared that the students would take the lead in the anti-"government" actions in order to preserve peace and achieve democracy on this land.

articles.title: Religionists Call for Peace on Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
Religionists Call for Peace on Korean Peninsula
 Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- Religious organizations in countries and regions released statements on Dec. 14 calling for peace on the Korean Peninsula as regards the escalating military tension there. 
					 The Evangelist Church of Germany (EKD) urged the south Korean authorities to stop all military actions, saying that the crisis of the peninsula should be settled in a diplomatic way.
					
					 The United Church of Canada (UCC) stressed that the tension of the peninsula should be eased through negotiation and dialogue. 
					
					 On the danger of a war growing on the peninsula, the Christian Conference of Asia (CCA) stressed the need to replace the Armistice Agreement with a peace treaty at once in order to prevent such dangerous developments.

articles.title: Anniversaries of DPRK Observed Abroad
articles.content:
Anniversaries of DPRK Observed Abroad
Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- A seminar took place in Pakistan and a film show in Thailand between December 10 and 13 on the occasions of the 19th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's gaining of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 93rd birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					 The participants in the film show watched the Korean film "Reply of DPRK".
					
					 The secretary general of the Lahore Branch of the Pakistan-Korea Friendship Association said that the nearly two decades were a historic period in which Supreme Commander Kim Jong Il has defended socialism and demonstrated the sovereignty and dignity of the nation by frustrating the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces' offensive to stifle the DPRK with his rare wisdom and preeminent strategy.
					
					 He stressed that the KPA is sure to always emerge victorious under his commandership.
					
					 The secretary of the Pakistan Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification noted that the Korean people revere Kim Jong Suk so deeply because her career occupies outstanding pages in the modern history of Korea.
					
					 She worked heart and soul to bring Kim Jong Il up as a successor loyal to the revolutionary cause of Juche pioneered by President Kim Il Sung and a true son of the country and its people, the secretary said, and went on:
					
					 Her august name will always remain shining along with Kim Il Sung's Korea and Kim Jong Il's Korea.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Venezuela
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Venezuela
 Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "On Preserving the Juche Character and National Character of the Revolution and Construction" was brought out in booklet by the Canta Clara Publishing House of Venezuela on Dec. 11. 
					 The work, published on June 19, Juche 86 (1997), clarifies the idea that adherence to the Juche character and national character in the revolution and construction is a fundamental principle to be held fast to in accomplishing the cause of socialism and the tasks and ways for putting it into practice.

articles.title: Comandancia Suprema del EPC demanda distinguir al provocador
articles.content:
Comandancia Suprema del EPC demanda distinguir al provocador
Pyongyang, 20 de diciembre (ATCC) -- La Comandancia Suprema del Ejercito Popular de Corea publico el dia 20 la siguiente informacion:
					A pesar de la advertencia fuerte de nuestro ejercito y las protestas internas y externas, los imperialistas yanqui y los belicistas de la capa militar titere del Sur de Corea cometieron la imprudente provocacion militar de disparar miles de balas y bombas en los alrededores de la isla Yonphyong en el Mar Oeste de Corea durante casi una hora desde las 14 y media del dia 20, en vez de aprender la leccion en su vergonzosa derrota sufrida en el anterior cruce de obuses en la misma isla.
					
					Esta provocacion militar partio del astuto designio de ellos de llevar al borde de guerra la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana al suscitar la reaccion militar de la RPDC y de remediar de esta manera su politica sobre Asia y estrategia sobre Corea que estan a punto de ser fracasadas.
					
					  Al mismo tiempo, persiguio los fines de propaganda para salvar el decoro de las actuales autoridades titeres surcoreanas, que por su ignorancia e incapacidad, cayeron en la crisis de gobernabilidad tan general y seria que casi no les deja cumplir el resto de su mandato, y del desmoralizado circulo militar surcoreano.
					
					  En particular, no paso de ser un juego con fuego de los cobardones que por temor al segundo y tercer golpes de represalia y autodefensa de nuestro ejercito, modificaron en silencio la zona de fuego y el punto de caida de proyectiles, planeados anteriormente, y dispararon haciendo mucha bulla los obuses que les faltaron por tirar en la provocacion del pasado 23 de noviembre.
					
					  Por lo tanto, a nuestras fuerzas armadas revolucionarias no les hace falta responder caso por caso a las provocaciones militares tan bajas de los que reciben golpes de cara a cara y esgrimen punos a las espaldas.
					
					  El segundo y tercer golpes de respuesta de nuestras fuerzas armadas revolucionarias seran ilimitadas como ya se anuncio a todo el mundo y terminaran eliminando el bastion de EE.UU. y los belicistas titeres surcoreanos.
					
					  El mundo debe ver bien quien es el verdadero defensor de la paz en Peninsula Coreana y quien es el provocador real de la guerra.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe presente de Bill Richardson
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe presente de Bill Richardson
						
Pyongyang, 20 de diciembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il recibio regalo que le dirigiera el gobernador de Nuevo Mexico de Estados Unidos, Bill Richardson, de visita en Corea.
					El visitante lo entrego el dia 20 a Kim Yong Dae, vicepresidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.

articles.title: RPDC ajustara la cuenta con EE.UU., declara MINREX
articles.content:
RPDC ajustara la cuenta con EE.UU., declara MINREX
Pyongyang, 20 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Ahora en la Peninsula Coreana se da una situacion a punto de explosion debido a la provocacion militar de los titeres surcoreanos que bajo la instigacion de EE.UU., tratan de abrir nuevamente el fuego real de artilleria en la isla Yonphyong.
					Al respecto, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publica el dia 18 la siguiente declaracion:
					
					EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos tratan de cometer otra vez el canonazo en la isla Yonphyong, zona litigiosa mas delicada, con la malsana intencion de mantener a toda costa la "linea de limite al Norte" y desatar la guerra. 
					
					Desde el principio, esta "linea" ha sido una invencion ilegal que contraviene al Acuerdo de Armisticio de Corea. Por lo tanto, todas las acciones de los titeres surcoreanos para mantenerla resultaron tambien flagrante violacion del citado acuerdo.
					
					Segun el articulo 13 del capitulo 2 del Acuerdo de Armisticio, nuestra parte tiene la jurisdiccion sobre todas las islas y aguas maritimas al norte y al oeste de la linea limitrofe entre las provincias de Hwanghae y Kyonggi, excepto a 5 islas incluso Paekryong y Yonphyong ocupadas entonces por las tropas norteamericanas.
					
					Ademas, el articulo 15 del capitulo 2 estipula que la contraparte no puede cometer ninguna accion militar en el mar litoral administrado por nuestra parte y esta tiene el derecho a tomar cualquier accion necesaria cuando ocurra tal caso.
					
					Despues de firmado el Acuerdo de Armisticio, el entonces comandante de las "Fuerzas de la ONU", Clark, establecio unilateralmente esa polemica "linea".
					
					Este mismo hecho fue una violacion flagrante del articulo 61 del capitulo 5, segun el cual la modificacion del acuerdo se hace solo mediante el consenso entre ambas partes. 
					
					Ya en la decada de 1970, el secretario de Estado, el embajador en el Sur de Corea y otras autoridades de EE.UU. habian reconocido que la "linea de limite al Norte" es la ilegal que contraviene al derecho internacional.
					
					Aunque ultimamente, EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos desarrollan sucesivamente los ejercicios militares provocativos, nos controlamos al maximo mientras los obuses no caen directamente en nuestras aguas jurisdiccionales, partiendo del deseo de frenar el empeoramiento de la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana y preservar la paz y la estabilidad.
					
					Sin embargo, ellos intentan disparar otra vez hacia las aguas jurisdiccionales de nuestra parte en la isla Yonphyong, donde reina el clima de combate debido al choque armado de noviembre pasado. 
					
					 Esto es la burla nunca tolerable a nuestra paciencia y la provocacion belicosa nunca justificable. 
					
					Si el fuego artillero de los titeres surcoreanos pasa el limite de prohibicion, seran inevitables la explosion de la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana y sus consecuencias. 
					
					Nuestras fuerzas armadas revolucionarias ya han declarado solemnemente que castigarian implacable y tajantemente a los provocadores que atenten la soberania y la integridad territorial de la RPDC. 
					
					Nuestro ejercito no dice palabras hueras. 
					
					Ya que las fuerzas hostiles pretendieron tergiversar el primer choque armado en la isla Yonphyong como "provocacion" de la RPDC, tenemos la necesidad de aclarar previamente la responsabilidad del eventual segundo incidente de la misma isla.
					
					La mayor parte de la responsabilidad recae sobre EE.UU. que instigo a los titeres surcoreanos a la provocacion. 
					
					Ahora los paises vecinos y toda la sociedad internacional urgen el cese incondicional del peligrosisimo fuego artillero en la isla Yonphyong.
					
					Solo EE.UU. lo azuza abiertamente amenazando y chantajeando a la RPDC para que esta no tome la medida de autodefensa. 
					
					El presidente de la Junta de Jefes de Estado Mayor de EE.UU., que viajo al Sur de Corea en la primera quincena del mes en curso, trazo minuciosamente con los belicistas militares surcoreanos el plan de fuego artillero en la isla Yonphyong en el principio de "bajo el protagonismo del ejercito surcoreano y con el apoyo de tropas norteamericanas".
					
					Segun ello, los uniformados norteamericanos participaran directamente en el tiro bajo el rotulo de control de mando, garantia de comunicaciones y asistencia medica. Y todas las tropas norteamericanas estacionadas en el Sur de Corea y todo el ejercito titere surcoreano lo respaldaran entrando en la disposicion de combate.
					
					Por otra parte, el Departamento de Estado de EE.UU. chantajeo a la RPDC diciendo que no olvidara la presencia de estadounidenses y reporteros extranjeros en la isla Yonphyong. Es decir, EE.UU. esta preparando directamente hasta el "escudo humano".
					
					Todos los hechos muestran claramente que para sus intereses estrategicos, no le importan ni un comino a EE.UU. la paz y la estabilidad de un pais.
					
					Ajustaremos la cuenta con EE.UU. de todas las circunstancias extremadas que se daran en la Peninsula Coreana y de sus consecuencias.

articles.title: Amenaza nuclear proviene de EE.UU., reafirma Minju Joson
articles.content:
Amenaza nuclear proviene de EE.UU., reafirma Minju Joson
Pyongyang, 20 de diciembre (ATCC) -- En octubre pasado, Alemania propuso evacuar las armas nucleares norteamericanas emplazadas en los paises miembros de la OTAN.
					Esta iniciativa fue apoyada por Holanda, Noruega, Belgica y Luxemburgo.
					
					  La creciente demanda de la retirada de armas nucleares norteamericanas de la region europea refleja el unanime anhelo de la humanidad de prevenir la guerra nuclear, senala el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual difundido el dia 19.
					
					Igualmente, demuestra que ese problema devino una prioridad politica y diplomatica para Europa, opina el comentarista y continua:
					
					  El emplazamiento y mantenimiento de armas nucleares norteamericanas en los paises europeos son un acto antipaz y desafiante a la epoca actual que se orienta al desarme rechazando la guerra nuclear.
					
					  Tomar el monopolio de armas nucleares y la supremacia en la posesion de armas de ataque estrategico es la ambicion y estrategia nuclear de EE.UU.
					
					  Partiendo de esta meta criminal, el imperio distribuyo sus enormes fuerzas armadas nucleares en los nidos estrategicos del mundo y gasta cada ano fabulosos fondos para la modernizacion de ellas. Al mismo tiempo, endurece la amenaza nuclear sobre sus rivales y "enemigos potenciales" trasladando sus tecnologias nucleares a sus satelites.
					
					  Este ano, EE.UU. definio abiertamente a la RPDC y otros paises antiimperialistas e independientes como blancos de ataque preventivo nuclear en su "informe de revision de estado nuclear".
					
					  La realidad comprueba que EE.UU. es culpable de amenaza y proliferacion nucleares en escala internacional.
					
					  Ahora, se agrava la carrera armamentista nuclear y se aumenta cada dia mas el peligro de guerra nuclear.  Esto es el resultado de la politica nuclear de ese imperio.

articles.title: 2010 es el ano victorioso y glorioso, subraya Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
2010 es el ano victorioso y glorioso, subraya Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 20 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Este ano es el jubiloso y emocionante en que se abrio un horizonte prometedor en el camino de Corea que avanza enarbolando la bandera del Songun y se produjeron innovaciones y saltos sin precedentes en todos los sectores de construccion de la gran potencia prospera.
					  Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual del dia 20 y prosigue:
					
					  No se puede impedir de ninguna manera el avance del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea bajo la direccion del gran partido mediante el Songun.
					
					La lucha de este ano resulto historica porque demostro a todo el mundo como se realizan los ideales del pueblo coreano.
					
					  La Conferencia del Partido del Trabajo de Corea efectuada en septiembre pasado fue importante evento politico que marco un hito para traer un viraje trascendental en la causa revolucionaria del Juche y la de construccion de la gran potencia prospera socialista.
					
					  Mediante ese conclave, todo el ejercito y el pueblo manifestaron su conviccion y voluntad de adelantar el futuro maravilloso de la Corea de Kim Il Sung bajo la guia del invencible PTC, convencidos de que seran siempre victoriosos y gloriosos si siguen al Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					  Este ano es el de milagros y cambios en que acontecieron eventos especiales, a ser registrados eternamente en la historia de la patria, gracias a la extraordinaria capacidad politica y grandiosa guia del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, genial comandante del Songun nacido en el monte Paektu.
					
					  La orgullosa victoria de este ano es la de gran unidad monolitica entre el Dirigente y el pueblo coreano.
					
					  Gracias a esta unidad, se produciran sucesivamente en el territorio patrio cambios sorprendentes que estremeceran al mundo y se adelantara el dia historico de declaracion de la gran potencia prospera.
